凌.definition: to approach; to rise high; thick ice; to insult or maltreat

凌兢.definition: (literary) icy cold; (literary) to shiver; to tremble

凌夷.definition: to deteriorate; to decline; to slump; also written 陵夷

凌志.definition: Lexus, luxury vehicle brand of Toyota Motor Corporation

凌志美.definition: Laura Ling, US-Taiwanese woman journalist imprisoned as spy by North Korea in 2009

凌晨.definition: very early in the morning; in the wee hours

凌汛.definition: ice-jam flood (arising when river downstream freezes more than upstream)

凌河.definition: Linghe district of Jinzhou city 錦州市|锦州市, Liaoning

凌河區.definition: Linghe district of Jinzhou city 錦州市|锦州市, Liaoning

凌海市.definition: Linghai, county-level city in Jinzhou 錦州市|锦州市[Jin3zhou1 Shi4], Liaoning

凌源市.definition: Lingyuan, county-level city in Chaoyang 朝陽市|朝阳市[Chao2yang2 Shi4], Liaoning

凌濛初.definition: Ling Mengchu (1580-1644), Ming dynasty novelist and dramatist

凌空.definition: be high up in the sky

凌辱.definition: to insult; to humiliate; to bully

凌遲.definition: the lingering death; the death of a thousand cuts (old form of capital punishment)

凌雲縣.definition: Lingyun county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi

凌駕.definition: to be above; to place above
